author: fwyzard
body:
Adapt the DQM client to the updated DQMEDHarvesting interface, which is necessary to properly update histograms online, and in general when running the DQM harvesting with the "Online" convention.

If possible, this might be useful to have for MWGR#7.
It requires (and includes) #5303 .
title: FastTimerServiceClient: update plots after every lumisection
